definitions: Put or set down (something) in a specific place.
Place (money) in a bank or other financial institution.
Lay down (a layer or covering) naturally or by a chemical process.
Give (something) as a pledge or down payment.
examples: He deposited the book on the table.
She deposited her savings in the bank.
The river deposited silt along its banks.
They deposited a sum to secure the booking.
